RainbruRPG::Terminal::SLangCommand

RainbruRPG::Terminal::SLangCommand Class Reference

#include <slangcommand.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A super-class used by ScollingPanel to store SLang commands.

virtual void RainbruRPG::Terminal::SLangCommand::execute ( int  x1,
int  y1,
int  x2,
int  y2 
) [pure virtual]

The drawing capability of a SLang command.

When the ScollingPanel must refresh its content, it executes all SLangCommand subclasses this routine.

Parameters:
x1 The top left physical coordonate
y1 The top left physical coordonate
x2 The bottom right physical coordonate
y2 The bottom right physical coordonate
